version_description:
- Special Login Reward added
- Gameplay balance revamped
- Bugs fixed
Please visit the official Facebook page for details.
Fixed bugs

Announcing Worldwide Launch!
A Journey through the darkness!

Announcing Worldwide Launch!
A Journey through the darkness!

- New Raid Boss “Gigantes” Arrived!
- Added new costumes, “Three-kingdoms” and “Rashguard”
- Minor system improvements for game stability

- Max level has been raised from 60 to 80!
- New ""Molt Island"" Adventure Region added!
- New story added!
- New gear sets for each character added!
- New ""Elf"" costume added!

- Experience exciting new raid content in the Immortal Raid!
- New 'Uniform' costume added!

- Belt parts added!
- Emblems added: Show off your achievements with these special emblems!
- Emote function added: Use these new emotes to communicate with other players!
- Shinobi costume added!

- Belt parts added!
- Emblems added: Show off your achievements with these special emblems!
- Emote function added: Use these new emotes to communicate with other players!
- Shinobi costume added!

- New ""Challenger Tower"" mode added: Seize the Tower quickly to receive a special ranking reward!
- Event Shop open: Use event currency to purchase a variety of products!
- New ""Arena of Nature"" map added: Battle it out on this new 1:1 map!
- New costume and deco added
- Vindictus has come to Darkness Rises! Check out the new collaboration event!

- New ""Challenger Tower"" mode added: Seize the Tower quickly to receive a special ranking reward!
- Event Shop open: Use event currency to purchase a variety of products!
- New ""Arena of Nature"" map added: Battle it out on this new 1:1 map!
- New costume and deco added
- Vindictus has come to Darkness Rises! Check out the new collaboration event!

- New ""++"" Gear is Here: Equip rare ""++"" gear and try out new skills!
- New Story: Check out the new Bihaum Temple storyline!
- Max Development Level Increase: The level caps for character level, skill level, and essence enhancement level have increased.
- Halloween Festival: Check out the new Halloween theme, costumes, and events.
- Gem Shop Update: More items can now be purchased with Gems.
- New costume and deco added.

- New ""Wing"" costume decos added: Angel, Devil, and Skeleton Wings now available!
- Immortal Raid 2 added: Additional stages and achievements now available.
- Raid 2 added: Additional stages and related rewards now available.
- Refinement levels added: You can now refine up to Lv. 10!
- New ""Hanbok"" costume added

- New ""Archer"" class available: embark on this epic adventure with a brand-new character!
- An event celebrating the release of the Archer: develop your Archer quickly with the Journey Event!
- Various events and a special shop to celebrate Black Friday!
- New ""Steampunk"" costume added!

- New ""Archer"" class available: embark on this epic adventure with a brand-new character!
- An event celebrating the release of the Archer: develop your Archer quickly with the Journey Event!
- Various events and a special shop to celebrate Black Friday!
- New ""Steampunk"" costume added!

- Adorable pets added: Take pets with special abilities on your adventures!
- Christmas Event: All sorts of gifts and festivities are waiting under your tree!
- Christmas has come to DR! You'll find holiday cheer in every corner of the game!
- New 'Bunny' and 'Christmas' costumes added

- Adorable pets added: Take pets with special abilities on your adventures!
- Christmas Event: All sorts of gifts and festivities are waiting under your tree!
- Christmas has come to DR! You'll find holiday cheer in every corner of the game!
- New 'Bunny' and 'Christmas' costumes added

- New 'Brawl' mode added: Test your strength against other players!
- '++' accessories added. Strengthen your characters with '++' accessories!
- PvP rewards updated: Receive new and improved rewards!
- New emblems added.
- New 'Cooking Master' costumes added.
- Other miscellaneous updates made to improve player experience.

- Gate of the Dead now available: Challenge the Gate of the Dead!
- Lunar New Year Festival! Participate in the event to obtain costumes from 2018!
- New ++ Costumes: Diabolic Set
- Pet Re-Breakthrough system added.
- New Emblems added.
- Other miscellaneous updates made to improve player experience.

- Gate of the Dead now available: Challenge the Gate of the Dead!
- Lunar New Year Festival! Participate in the event to obtain costumes from 2018!
- New ++ Costumes: Diabolic Set
- Pet Re-Breakthrough system added.
- New Emblems added.
- Other miscellaneous updates made to improve player experience.

- Challenger Tower is back: Aim for higher floors to earn special rewards!
- 4 new pets added: Obtain these extra strong new pets!
- Gold Dungeon & Daily Dungeon levels added
- New 'Garden Party' costume added
- 5 new costume decos added
- Pet Grimoire system added
- Continuous Crafting feature added
- Other miscellaneous updates made to improve player experience.

Guild Raid added
Guild UI and recommendation function improved
Costume development system added
Halloween Event in progress
New costumes added

- New Four Guardians boss added!
- New 'Hanbok 2' costumes added
- The return of the Regina raid!

- Raid Reward updated
- S++ Gear Morph System added
- Camp 'Research' function added

- New '++' gear added: Boost your strength with new skills!
- Improved PVP matchmaking and rewards: High-ranking players will receive special temporary items as rewards.
- New 'Sheriff' costumes added.
- Improved chest: Guaranteed to contain Rank B or higher gear.
- Other miscellaneous updates made to improve player experience.

- Rank S Gear Fusion added: Obtain better Rank S gear by fusing 2 Rank S gear items with maxed-out stats!
- Dyeing Choice Ticket added: Choose any color of dye for your gear!
- Enhanced Refinement: Number of Traits increased from 2 to 3.
- New 'ROT3K 2' costumes added.
- Other miscellaneous updates made to improve player experience.

- Rank S Gear Fusion added: Obtain better Rank S gear by fusing 2 Rank S gear items with maxed-out stats!
- Dyeing Choice Ticket added: Choose any color of dye for your gear!
- Enhanced Refinement: Number of Traits increased from 2 to 3.
- New 'ROT3K 2' costumes added.
- Other miscellaneous updates made to improve player experience."

- Gear Transcendence function added: Transcend your gear to increase its stats and max level!
- New 'Regina Dungeon' mode added: Get ready for this brand-new event!
- New costume added: Vindictus 3
- Guild recommendation function improved
- Brawl AI added
- PvP score calculation method changed
- Other miscellaneous updates made to improve player experience.

Our 2nd Year Anniversary Update has arrived with tons of new content!

2. Don’t miss out on our limited time 2nd Year Anniversary Events!
3. Character balance has been adjusted
